# Faction: Impostor Total: 56

Eliminate all Crewmates and Neutrals from the game by any means necessary. Each role has a unique way of accomplishing their goal. From mass-killing to framing others, they have to find any means necessary to win.

Role Count
Concealing14
Hindering5
Killing23
Madmate2
Support12

# Concealing

Escapist | Mastermind | Miner | Puppeteer | Scavenger | Shapemaster | Shapeshifter | Soul Catcher | Swooper | Trickster | Undertaker | Vampire | Warlock | Wildling

# Hindering

Anonymous | Dazzler | Devourer | Pitfall | Twister

# Killing

Agent | Arrogance | Berserker | Bomber | Bounty Hunter | Chronomancer | Councillor | Cursed Wolf | Deathpact | Evil Guesser | Greedy | Inhibitor | Ludopath | Lurker | Mercenary | Ninja | Quick Shooter | Saboteur | Sniper | Spellcaster | Trapster | Underdog

# Madmate

Crewpostor | Parasite

# Support

Camouflager | Cleaner | Consigliere | Disruptor | Fireworker | Gangster | Godfather | Morphling | Nemesis | Time Thief | Vindicator | Visionary


Settings
Below are settings to make the game more balanced based on your lobby's style of gameplay:
  • Impostors know the roles of other Impostors
    • You'll know the roles of other Impostors by their role below their name and red color
    • You can turn this ON or OFF
  • Impostors know Madmates
    • You'll know the Madmate(s) by their role below their name and red color
    • You can turn this ON or OFF
  • Impostors can kill Madmates
    • Impostors can kill Madmate(s) using their respective kill button ability
    • You can turn this ON or OFF

  • Madmates know each other
    • You'll know who the other Mamdates are by their red color name
    • You can turn this ON or OFF
  • Madmates know Impostors
    • You'll know the roles of other Impostors by their role below their name and red color
    • You can turn this ON or OFF
  • Madmates can kill Impostors
    • Madmates with Killing roles will be able to kill Impostors
    • You can turn this ON or OFF
  • Madmates have Impostor vision
    • Madmates have maximum vision
    • You can turn this ON or OFF
  • Madmates can fix sabotages
    • Turning this ON will essentially give Madmates the Fool Add-on by default.
    • You can turn this ON or OFF

  • Refugee's Kill Cooldown
    • The cooldown for Refugee's kill ability

  • Default Shapeshift Cooldown

    • The default cooldown for any Impostor with the ability to shapeshift
    • From 5 (minumum) to 995 (maximum) seconds with 5 seconds intervals
  • Impostors can't sabotage after they've die
    • Impostors can't call any sabotages after they die
    • You can turn this ON or OFF
